[feat] Add Claude Skills v4.0.0 and comprehensive documentation

## Claude Skills System \(10 skills total\)

### Backend Skills \(6\)
- rails-resource: Complete Rails resource generation with patterns
- test-gen: Comprehensive Minitest test suite generation
- api-endpoint: RESTful JSON API with authentication
- background-job: Async task processing with Solid Queue
- service-object: Business logic extraction and separation
- query-object: Complex database query management

### DevOps Skills \(1\) ğŸ†•
- logging-setup: Production-grade logging system
  - Structured JSON logging \(Lograge\)
  - Business event tracking
  - Performance monitoring
  - Error tracking \(Sentry\)
  - Automated setup script

### Frontend Skills \(2\)
- ui-component: Tailwind UI components with design system
- stimulus-controller: Interactive UI with Turbo integration

### Documentation Skills \(1\)
- doc-sync: Automatic documentation synchronization

## Documentation Updates

### New Files
- .claude/SPECIALIZATION_GUIDE.md: Subagent vs Skills usage guide
- .claude/skills/README.md: Complete skills documentation

### Updated Files
- UI_TEST_GUIDE.md: Added project structure and file locations
  - Page URLs and file mappings
  - MVC structure overview
  - All implemented pages list

## Statistics
- Total: 10 skills
- ~7,884 lines of code and documentation
- 16 reference documents
- 6 executable scripts

\)")
